Susanne Bier

Birthday:
1960-04-15
Birthplace:
Copenhagen, Denmark

Awards

  • 2006: N Best Foreign Film at Academy Awards
  • 2010: W Best Foreign Film at Academy Awards

Susanne Bier (born 15 April 1960) is a Danish film director best known for her feature films Brothers, After the Wedding and the Academy-Award-winning In a Better World. Susanne Bier, licensed under CC-BY-SA

6 films

Director1995Pensionat Oskar
